title: Upcoming changes to League Partner chromas

replies.body:
This. This is good!

Everyone wins, creators get some well deserved attention and officially, regular players don't feel unable to complete their collections because of it, but those who do receive codes still maintain a level of uniqueness.

Absolutely well played!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

can anyone from Riot explain what will be included in the upcoming essence emporium? i kinda wanna pick up some chroma for some skins i have but i don't know if it is too old for that to happen.
its nemesis jax :0
